did.unittitle: Multnomah County Library Central Library plans
did.abstract: Collection includes: Numerous plans, sections, elevations, details and schedules on 33 sheets of the Central Library for the Multnomah County Library at SW 10th Ave and SW Yamhill St. in Portland, Oregon, scale 1/8" : 1' to 1:1, 1912. Doyle, Patterson and Beach was a Portland, Oregon architectural firm.

bioghist.p: Doyle, Patterson and Beach was a Portland, Oregon architectural firm.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Numerous plans, sections, elevations, details and schedules on 33 sheets of the Central Library for the Multnomah County Library at SW 10th Ave and SW Yamhill St. in Portland, Oregon, scale 1/8" : 1' to 1:1, 1912.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Multnomah County Library Central Library Plans, Mss 3076, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
